column5: Went out with Lloyd and the new U & Me boat last week for an evening of Chinooks. Lloyd was telling me how the boat was so much better to fish from bit I didn't believe him until we were out. Perfect setup for some monster Chinooks. Went 3 for 7 that night and we were only out for a few hours. Some pics below of the fish. I can't wait to get out on Quinte in that boat. For anyone who needs a good charter for Lake O out of Port Hope of Quinte give Lloyd a call.  http://www.stevemorissette.com/uandme/index.html      Cheers
I love the shot of the 3 salmon held on the same angle and Gnoddy its about time you posted a report was wondering where you had gone too.
Awesome gnoddy just awesome  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Was nice having you out. Look forward to seeing you again for walleye in Quinte
